title: Panimalare Song Lyrics In Tamil | Kaantha | Pradeep Kumar | Jhanu Chanthar

sections.intro: Immerse yourself in the vintage romance of Panimalare, the standout melody from the period drama Kaantha. Composed by Jhanu Chanthar and rendered by the magical Pradeep Kumar and Priyanka NK, this song captures a nostalgic '70s vibe. The poetic depth of Kutti Revathi's lyrics beautifully mirrors the timeless love story of Dulquer Salmaan and Bhagyashri Borse.

  • Detail 1: The musical arrangement features live cello and violin sections performed by Francis and Rithu Vysakh, intentionally mixed to evoke the warm analog sound of 1970s Tamil cinema recordings.
  • Detail 2: This song marks the first major collaboration between music director Jhanu Chanthar and Pradeep Kumar, designed to pay homage to the 'Ilaiyaraaja era' melodies as requested by director Selvamani Selvaraj.
  • Detail 3: The film *Kaantha* is set in 1950s Madras, and the lyrics 'Valarpiraye' (Waxing Moon) are a subtle nod to the classical Tamil literature tropes used by the 'First Superstar' character Dulquer plays in the movie.
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

Who are the singers of Panimalare?

The song is sung by the popular playback singers Pradeep Kumar and Priyanka NK.

What is the significance of the movie Kaantha?

Kaantha is a period drama set in the 1950s, co-produced by Dulquer Salmaan and Rana Daggubati, revolving around the life of a superstar in the Madras film industry.
